seo.title: Secure PDF Signer - Free & No Login
seo.description: Free online tool to sign PDFs. 100% local processing, secure and no registration required.

howTo.title: How to Sign PDF Online for Free
howTo.description: Our tool allows you to sign PDF documents directly in your browser, without the need to install software or upload your files to unknown servers. Follow the steps below:

step1.title: Upload PDF:
step1.description: Drag and drop your file in the area above.

step2.title: Create Signature:
step2.description: Use mouse, touch or keyboard to create your custom signature.

step3.title: Position:
step3.description: Drag the signature to the correct place in the document.

step4.title: Download:
step4.description: Click "Download Signed PDF" to save the file instantly.

privacy.title: Total Privacy
privacy.description: Your files never leave your computer. All processing is done locally in your browser.

noSignup.title: No Registration
noSignup.description: We don't require email, login or credit card. Just open and use.

fast.title: Fast & Lightweight
fast.description: Optimized to load instantly, even on slow connections.

compatibility.title: Compatibility
compatibility.description: Works on Chrome, Edge, Firefox and Safari, on both desktop and mobile.

free.question: Is the service really free?
free.answer: Yes! Our PDF signature tool is 100% free for personal and professional use.

saved.question: Are my documents saved?
saved.answer: No. Our "Local-First" technology ensures the file is never sent to our servers. It is processed in your device's memory and discarded as soon as you close the page.

upload.title: Upload your document
upload.description: Your files are processed locally and never leave your device.

PrivacyBadge.title: Privacy Guaranteed
PrivacyBadge.description: Your documents are never sent to any server. All processing happens in your browser memory.
